id: scenario-value-scanner-senior-scenarios-community-cultural and artistic contributions to community life
title: Cultural and artistic contributions to community life
description: Cultural and artistic contributions to community life
content:
Scenario: Cultural and artistic contributions to community life
    Given Margaret has time for cultural and creative pursuits
    And community cultural life requires participation
    When Margaret engages in community cultural activities
    Then her participation and leadership should be tracked
    And cultural contributions should be recognized as care work
    And community flourishing includes cultural richness
    And Margaret's creative labor should be valued
    And seniors should be visible in community cultural life
    And arts and culture should be part of care economy
